meaningMnemonic: When a <radical>man</radical> meets a <radical>tiger</radical> he makes the tiger his <kanji>captive</kanji>. Men are pretty crappy like that. They see tigers and they want to put them in cages, so the poor tiger becomes a captive of the man.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>captive</kanji> tiger is even sadder because the man put him in a <reading>ro</reading>be (りょ) and is making him act like a human. Tigers look good in robes, but they don't really enjoy being forced into people clothing.
